skills.name: BLAZE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Remove a Beneficial Effect.

skills.name: GLIDE
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Lower Power and Fury Generation of enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: GUARDIAN
desc: Cannot be Stunned, Taunted, Slept, or Frozen (including by unblockable Freeze).
